resources.string: Unleash Your Best Self Every Day.

Find Your Best. Be Your Best.
From Good to Great, Become the Best You.

Welcome to TV Pulse, a free and open-source app built by a single human (hi, that's me üëã). This is a passion project, so please be kind‚ÄîI'm just trying my best here!
The Highlights: Your Data Stays Local: Everything stays on your device. No servers, no clouds, just your TV obsessions. No Tracking, Ever: I don't care what you watch or where you watch it. No tracking, no snooping, zero ads. Open Source Magic: Feel free to poke around the code, suggest fixes, or laugh at my spaghetti logic on GitHub. No Warranties: If the app breaks, catches fire, or somehow causes you to binge a terrible show, I can't be held responsible. By using TV Pulse, you agree to chill, enjoy, and maybe even contribute. ‚ù§Ô∏è
That‚Äôs it. Have fun tracking your TV life!
Close the app, and uninstall it you don\'t agree to these terms!
